akas: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (original title)
Rampo Kitan: Game of Laplace World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (original title)
Rampo Kitan: Game of Laplace World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: The Human Chair, Part 1

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

1.plot: One morning, a junior-high student, Kobayashi, wakes up and finds himself in his classroom with his homeroom teacher's body. In his hand is a murder weapon. A high-school detective, Akechi, is called in to assist the police to solve the case.

2.title: The Human Chair, Part 2

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

2.plot: Kobayashi has been arrested. It seems that he's been charged with additional crimes. Before the police take him away, he whispers something to Hashiba. What will happen to him? Who is the real killer? Will he be able to solve this crime?

3.title: Shadow-Man

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

3.plot: Nine girls have been abducted in two months and the police suspect that Shadow-Man, a master of disguise and gentleman thief, might be the kidnapper. When Akechi declines to take part in this case, Kobayashi asks if he can investigate it instead.

4.title: Twenty Faces

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

4.plot: A man who calls himself Twenty Faces commits a series of murders. His victims are all criminals who have escaped justice and have not atoned for their crimes. Before he kills, he posts a message on the Internet to explain who he's going to kill and why.

5.title: The Caterpillar

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: A Glimpse into Hell

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

6.plot: Akechi's chaotic day starts when Kobayashi finds an abandoned kitten at the front door of the Akechi Detective Agency. Kobayashi wants to keep the kitten, but Akechi does not approve. Then another incident occurs. This time, Shadow-Man is involved.

7.title: Strange Tale of Panorama Island, Part 1

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

7.plot: As Kagami predicted, more Twenty Faces have been appearing, ten in the previous month, and now in the current month, the fourth one has just appeared. Akechi and Nakamura head to Panorama Island to inspect the latest crime scene.

8.title: Strange Tale of Panorama Island, Part 2

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

8.plot: Joined by Kobayashi and Hashiba, Akechi solves the crime committed in the exhibition hall on Panorama Island. After coming back from the island, when Kobayashi and Hashiba stop by the office as usual, Akechi starts telling them about his past.

9.title: Terrifying Mistake

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

9.plot: Akechi spends his days and nights trying to figure out the formula that he and Namikoshi created in order to put an end to the Twenty Faces case. Being very curious about the formula, Kobayashi skips school to help Akechi with his work.

10.title: A Desire for Transformation

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

10.plot: The man pulling the strings of the latest Twenty Faces crime was Namikoshi, who everyone thought died three years ago. He starts talking about his junior high school days and how he came to start working on the formula with Akechi.

11.title: The Daydream

episode of.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

11.plot:

imdb.title: Ranpo Kitan: Game of Laplace
plot: A young boy,Kobayashi meets genius detective Akechi, who comes to his school to investigate several murder cases. Kobayashi takes an interest in Akechi and, in spite of his friend Hashiba's worries, he volunteers to be Akechi's assistant.
